### Basic column chart

<div class="row">

<!-- First column for large screen --> 
<div class="col-lg-6">

```{python python_code, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
# import libraries
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

# show static image in the notebook
%matplotlib inline

df = pd.read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GDS-ODSSS/unhcr-dataviz-platform/master/data/comparison/column.csv')

x = df.loc[:, 'year'].values
y = df.loc[:, 'displaced_number'].values

fig, ax = plt.subplots(nrows = 1, ncols = 1)

bar_plot = ax.bar(x, y, color = '#0072BC', linestyle = '-', linewidth=1, label = 'Legend2')

ax.set_title('Global IDP displacement | 2010 - 2020', fontsize=15, fontweight='bold', loc='left', pad=40, color = '#444444')

ax.set_ylabel('Displaced population (millions)', color = '#333333', fontsize = 10).set_visible(True)

ax.tick_params(axis='both', which='both', 
               labelsize=12, bottom=False, top=False, labelbottom=True, 
               left=False, right=False, labelleft=True, color = '#333333', labelcolor = '#333333')

ax.spines['top'].set_visible(False)
ax.spines['bottom'].set_visible(True)
ax.spines['right'].set_visible(False)
ax.spines['left'].set_visible(False)

ax.grid(axis='y', lw=.5, c='k', alpha=.3)
ax.set_axisbelow(True)

# yaxis label formarter
def millions(x, pos):
    return '{:1.0f}M'.format(x*1e-6)
ax.yaxis.set_major_formatter(millions)

fig.tight_layout()

plt.show()

```

</div>
<!-- End First column --->

```{python python_column_chart, echo=FALSE, out.width="100%", fig.height=5.75}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GDS-ODSSS/unhcr-dataviz-platform/master/data/comparison/column.csv')

x = df.loc[:, 'year'].values
y = df.loc[:, 'displaced_number'].values

fig, ax = plt.subplots(nrows = 1, ncols = 1)

bar_plot = ax.bar(x, y, color = '#0072BC', linestyle = '-', linewidth=1, label = 'Legend2')

ax.set_title('Global IDP displacement | 2010 - 2020',loc='left', fontsize=15, fontweight='bold', pad=30, color = '#444444')

ax.set_ylabel('Displaced population (millions)', color = '#333333', fontsize = 10).set_visible(True)

ax.tick_params(axis='both', which='both', 
               labelsize=10, bottom=False, top=False, labelbottom=True, 
               left=False, right=False, labelleft=True, color = '#333333', labelcolor = '#333333')

ax.spines['top'].set_visible(False)
ax.spines['bottom'].set_visible(True)
ax.spines['right'].set_visible(False)
ax.spines['left'].set_visible(False)

ax.grid(axis='y', lw=.5, c='k', alpha=.3)
ax.set_axisbelow(True)

def millions(x, pos):
    return '{:1.0f}M'.format(x*1e-6)
ax.yaxis.set_major_formatter(millions)

fig.tight_layout()

plt.show()
```
